page.title: 12FARMING OR CROFTING S.HARRIS
page.content: {EAST SIDE OF HARRIS} This area is very rocky with little land for cultivation.Strips of land, called {LAZY BEDS,}are cultivated.In these lazy beds we plant {potatoes} and other {vegetables},such as carrots turnip,cabbage,onions,cauliflour, lettuce. Manure or seaweed is used as fertiliser.The ground is turned with a spade.{Corn}is grown for feeding the cattle .{Hay}is harvested for feeding the sheep in winter.In summer sheep and lambs are sent out to graze on the hills. They are then brought in for feeding in winter months.
